summary: This mod changes the weight and gold values of certain types of animal pelt, hide and animal tusk to better reflect their in-game value for a greater sense of realism. Hunting is no longer a pointless and tedious pastime! Now compatible with Skyrim version 1.9
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the weight and gold values of certain types of animal pelt, hide and animal tusk to better reflect their in-game value for a greater sense of realism. Hunting is no longer a pointless and tedious pastime! Now compatible with Skyrim version 1.9

Better Hunting Prices modifies the weight and gold values of these items according to multiple factors including:

- how hard said animal is to kill
- how rare said animal is in the game world
- how much application said animal's pelt/hide/tusk has in-game
- and finally how big the item retrieved from said animal is, which ultimately determines the weight of the item, as i found current weight values were off mark and did not really integrate well with the whole hunting experience.

The items changed and their new values are as follows:

Bear Cave Pelt - weight: 6 value: 105
Bear Pelt - weight: 5 value: 110
Bear Snow Pelt - weight: 6 value: 125
Cow Hide - weight: 4 value: 40
Deer Hide - weight: 2 value: 35
Deer Pelt - weight: 2 value: 30
Fox Pelt - weight: 1 value: 20
Fox Pelt Snow - weight: 1 value: 35
Goat Hide - weight: 1 value: 10
Horse Hide - weight: 2 value: 40
Mammoth Tusk - weight: 11 value: 180
Werewolf Pelt - weight: 4 value: 135
Wolf Ice Pelt - weight: 2 value: 55
Wolf Pelt - weight: 2 value: 45
Dragon Scales - weight: 12 value: 350
Horker Tusk - weight: 8 value: 80
Sabre Cat Pelt - weight: 4 value: 150
Sabre Cat Snow Pelt - weight: 4 value: 170
author: Kaya Suleyman
